page.title: 13THE RAILWAY LINE.
page.content: The railway line which goes through this area is the WATERLOO to EXETER line. The nearest station is Templecombe. The line was reopened on 3/10/83 after it had been closed for 16 years as uneconomic. The line was originaly opened in 1860. The older line to serve this area was the Bournemouth to Bath line but in 1966 this line was closed down. The track has been removed and the land returned to agriculture. The obselete track travelling from East to West through the Southern part of the area is that of the old S & D. Named for Somerset and Dorset it became affectionately known as the SLOW and DIRTY.
